## arrayUnion() function

Given an `ArrayLike` of `ArrayLike`<!-- -->, provides all unique items in an `Array`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function arrayUnion<TItem>(items: ArrayLike<ArrayLike<TItem>>, getComparisonValue?: (item: TItem, index: number) => unknown): TItem[];
```

|  getComparisonValue | (item: TItem, index: number) =&gt; unknown |  |
